ygData.subject: RE: Another suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: Dont take away shadow step that is one of the spells that is probably most useful.  Saved my tail on many occasions. Tesaar Grimm Hand of Innoruuk The Rathe
ygData.messageBody:
Dont take away shadow step that is one of the spells that is probably most
useful. Saved my tail on many occasions.

Tesaar Grimm
Hand of Innoruuk
The Rathe

-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Hook [mailto:bhook@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 11:29 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Another suggestion


From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>

Okay, here's a question for you folks. What if Shadow Step and Voice Graft
were replaced with some kind of lifetap spells? Would
this be grossly unbalancing or hurt the class?

If we tune the SK we can't really ADD new spells, since this would give them
more spells than the other hybrids at each rank.

Brian
